question: Who is the first Indian to win the prestigious Richard Dawkins Award?
explanation:
Indian poet cum writer Javed Akhtar has become the first Indian to receive the prestigious Richard Dawkins Award for 2020.
The award is named after the English evolutionary biologist Richard Dawkins. It is provided to individuals from the fields of science, education or entertainment, who publicly proclaim the values of secularism, rationalism and upholds scientific truth. The first edition of the award was awarded in the year 2003.
